channel.title: artist-interview on Krita
channel.description: Recent content in artist-interview on Krita

item.title: Interview with Simon Rollins
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? My full name is Simon Sterling Rollins. Most people call me Simon. I was born in July 2005 in the state of Georgia.

item.title: Interview with Ali Bahabadi
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? My full name is Mohammad-Ali Bahabadi, but I sign with my shortened version of my name, Ali Bahabadi.

item.title: Interview with Tansy Branscombe
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? I’m currently in my 4th year of a PhD in Archaeological Science at the University of Oxford, specialising in the reconstruction of ancient environmental conditions using shellfish remains.

item.title: Interview with Albert Weand
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? I’m an illustrator from Panama. I use Krita to create digital art, but I also work with traditional tools.

item.title: Interview with Clément Mona
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? Hello, I am a 36-year-old freelance illustrator and concept artist based in Brittany, France.

item.title: Interview with Jefferson Nascimento
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? I’m Jeff, a brazilian animator and character designer (sometimes illustrator). I have a bachelor’s degree in biology and cinema, the latter one being completed in 2019, specialized in animation.

item.title: Interview with Joshua Grier
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? I’m Josh, and I love design. There’s nothing better than taking people’s stories, thoughts, feelings, wants and needs and responding to them in practical ways.

item.title: Interview with Philipp Urlich
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? I’m from Switzerland and have studied art and graphic design in 90'.

item.title: Interview with Anilia
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? I’m Anilia, a freelance illustrator. I’m cooperating with many authors from all around the world.

item.title: Interview with TrishLaWitch
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? I am Patricia aka TrishLaWitch, I am a French woman who has never studied art.

item.title: Interview with Spihon
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? Hi, I’m Spihon, I’m a born Desert Rat of the United States who loves to read, dabble in a bit of writing and play tabletop games from D&D to Palladium campaigns.

item.title: Interview with Never Dot
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? My real world name is Andy Statia, but I go by Never Dot in the digital space.

item.title: Interview with Eka Icydust
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? I have a HUGE problem in picking favorites, copy others’ styles when I’m lazy (hehe):-D, ABSOLUTELY LOVE TO DRAW, play Minecraft, BlockstarPlanet, extra extra, horrible at controller, all my friends have a TV or TVs and I dont :(, hate Roblox but can still play it in Roblox banned countries and I basically love dark and creepy AND I’m not girly or boyish.

item.title: Interview with teteotolis
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? Hello! My name is teteotolis. I am a graduate of Athens School of Fine Arts (Greece) and I am a professional illustrator/comic artist/visual artist.

item.title: Interview with Bryan Wong
item.description: Note: The pictures in this post are large and intricate. Click on any picture to see it full size!

item.title: Interview with Haris Mujkic
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? My name is Haris Mujkic. I am an artist and game developer, located in Bosnia and Herzegovina.

item.title: Interview with Fabian Mosakowski
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? My name is Fabian Mosakowski and I’m an aspiring illustrator living in France. I’m currently working on my portfolio creating an illustrated fantasy tale called “If Only Blood Was Red”.

item.title: Interview with Samantha Skoros
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? Oh I’m terrible at talking about myself. I guess the easiest thing would be that I’m 26 years old and a mother.

item.title: Interview with Julius Grels
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? Sure. I’m Julius Grels, and “I like to call myself an artist whenever I’m wasted enough”.

item.title: Interview with Wojtek Trybus
item.description: Could you tell us something about yourself? My name is Wojtek Trybus and I publish artworks as wojtryb. I’m in the last year of Computer Science studies in Poland.
